abstract: A source told Reuters in no uncertain terms that Walt Disney is not interested in buying Telefonica‘s 75 percent stake in the TV producer Endemol. The cryptically worded message: “We are not interested in it,” the source said. Disney was touted on Monday as possibly being interested with Endemol co-founder John de Mol in forming an alliance to repurchase the Dutch production house.
lead_paragraph: A source told Reuters in no uncertain terms that Walt Disney is not interested in buying Telefonica‘s 75 percent stake in the TV producer Endemol. The cryptically worded message: “We are not interested in it,” the source said. Disney was touted on Monday as possibly being interested with Endemol co-founder John de Mol in forming an alliance to repurchase the Dutch production house.

headline.main: Endemol Leaves Disney Cold, Report Says
